name: Financial Analysis
author: Huitzo Team
tagline: Track your favorite stocks and get smart market insights
description: Keep tabs on the stocks you care about with live market data. Get technical analysis, trading signals, and personalized reports delivered to your email on your schedule.
features: Track up to 10 stocks in your personal watchlist
Live market data updated every 15 minutes
Automated reports sent straight to your email
Schedule reports daily, weekly, or when you want them
Optional AI-powered insights (tell the plugin what you want to know)

free.limits: Up to 10 stocks, 5 scheduled reports, perfect for getting started

quickstart.title: Add a stock to track
quickstart.description: Add any stock symbol (like AAPL for Apple) to start tracking it

quickstart.title: View your watchlist
quickstart.description: See all your stocks with current prices and daily changes

quickstart.title: Get market analysis
quickstart.description: Get a quick technical analysis report of your watchlist

quickstart.title: Set up automatic emails
quickstart.description: Get reports emailed to you automatically on your schedule

commands.description: Remove a stock from your watchlist

commands.description: Get a technical analysis report right now
